description.en:
Regiment. Finance is a hybrid DEFI protocol along with gaming and asset management

The hybrid approach is that there is regular rewards to farming participants which makes our inflationary approach while 1% burn on each Txn defines the deflationary mechanism 

Beside farming we have gaming and real use case NFTs which will be used in asset management and gaming environment.

The whole RTF ecosystem provides 

Farming+ Gaming+ Asset Management backed by NFTs.

Along with farming the gaming and asset management provides a fundamental support to the ecosystem.
